manifest:
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0

stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    env:
      CGO_ENABLED: 0
      GOOS: linux
      API_BASE_URL: ***
      CLIENT_ID: ***
      CLIENT_SECRET: ***
    commands:
    - go test ./...
    - go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags "-X main.appgroup=${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP_GROUP} -X main.app=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME} -X main.version=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION} -X main.revision=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_REVISION} -X main.branch=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_BRANCH} -X main.buildDate=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_DATETIME}" -o ./${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME} .

  extract-data:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    env:
      CGO_ENABLED: 0
      GOOS: linux
      API_BASE_URL: ***
      CLIENT_ID: ***
      CLIENT_SECRET: ***
      PIPELINES_TO_EXTRACT: github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-api,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-builder,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-contracts,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-crypt,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-demo,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-manifest,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-web,github.com/estafette/estafette-cloudflare-dns,github.com/estafette/estafette-letsencrypt-certificate
      LOG_OBFUSCATE_REGEX: ***
      ESTAFETTE_LOG_FORMAT: console
    commands:
    - ./${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME}

  git-clone-web:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    repo: estafette-ci-web
    branch: main

  copy-mock-data:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    env:
      GIT_USER_EMAIL: ***
      GIT_USER_NAME: ***
    commands:
    - rm -rf estafette-ci-web/mocks/api/pipelines
    - cp -r mocks/api/pipelines estafette-ci-web/mocks/api
    - apk add git
    - cd estafette-ci-web
    - git config --global user.email "${GIT_USER_EMAIL}"
    - git config --global user.name "${GIT_USER_NAME}"
    - git add --all && git commit --allow-empty -m "estafette-ci-demo ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}"
    - git push origin main
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: stable
  os: linux
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  language: golang
  team: estafette-team
version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch:
    - master
    - main
stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - go test ./...
    - go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags "-X main.appgroup=${ESTAFETTE_LABEL_APP_GROUP}
      -X main.app=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME} -X main.version=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
      -X main.revision=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_REVISION} -X main.branch=${ESTAFETTE_GIT_BRANCH}
      -X main.buildDate=${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_DATETIME}" -o ./${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME} .
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    env:
      API_BASE_URL: ***
      CGO_ENABLED: "0"
      CLIENT_ID: ***
      CLIENT_SECRET: ***
      GOOS: linux
  extract-data:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - ./${ESTAFETTE_GIT_NAME}
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    env:
      API_BASE_URL: ***
      CGO_ENABLED: "0"
      CLIENT_ID: ***
      CLIENT_SECRET: ***
      ESTAFETTE_LOG_FORMAT: console
      GOOS: linux
      LOG_OBFUSCATE_REGEX: ***
      PIPELINES_TO_EXTRACT: github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-api,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-builder,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-contracts,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-crypt,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-demo,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-manifest,github.com/estafette/estafette-ci-web,github.com/estafette/estafette-cloudflare-dns,github.com/estafette/estafette-letsencrypt-certificate
  git-clone-web:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    branch: main
    repo: estafette-ci-web
  copy-mock-data:
    image: golang:1.16-alpine
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - rm -rf estafette-ci-web/mocks/api/pipelines
    - cp -r mocks/api/pipelines estafette-ci-web/mocks/api
    - apk add git
    - cd estafette-ci-web
    - git config --global user.email "${GIT_USER_EMAIL}"
    - git config --global user.name "${GIT_USER_NAME}"
    - git add --all && git commit --allow-empty -m "estafette-ci-demo ${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}"
    - git push origin main
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    env:
      GIT_USER_EMAIL: ***
      GIT_USER_NAME: ***

commits.message: store alllogs for all build/release statuses
